item.title: Selected as a recipient for the project support from IITP
item.description: Computer System Architecture (CSArch) Lab received funding from Institute for Information & Communication Technology Planning & Evaluation (IITP) to support the research on development of chiplet-based hub SoC for on-device AI. Prof. Gunjae Koo will be working as a Co-PI of the research project. Thanks IITP!

item.title: Received the Korea University Insung Research Grant
item.description: Computer System Architecture (CSArch) Lab received the Korea University Insung Research Grant to support the research on near data processing for genome analytics. We want to express our sincere gratitude to generous supporters who have contributed to Korea University.

item.title: Received the outstanding young scientist grant (우수신진연구) from NRF
item.description: Computer System Architecture (CSArch) Lab received funding from National Research Foundation (NRF) to support the research on the processor and memory architecture for neural networks using large graph structures. Prof. Gunjae Koo was awarded the outstanding young scientist grant (우수신진연구) which is a part of Basic Research Projects funded by Korean government. Thanks NRF!
